remarks: Corollary of ~ dtru .  This example illustrates the danger of blindly trusting the standard Deduction Theorem without accounting for free variables: the theorem form of this deduction is not valid, as shown by ~ dtrucor2 .  (Contributed by NM, 27-Jun-2002.)
statement:
dtrucor.1 $e |- x = y $.
dtrucor $p |- x =/= y $.
$d x y $.
